special_text:
[+2]: Conjure a card named Solar Flare into your hand. [i](It's an instant with “Solar Flare deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life” that costs {R}{G}.)[/i]
[-2]: Add {R}{R}{G}{G}.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you conjure one or more cards, conjure a duplicate of one of those cards into your hand.”
